'''Radiant Spincrystal 151''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in a [[Qucusaurus]] nest next to the top-most [[Teleport Waypoint]] at [[Skyfire Circlet]], [[Natlan]].
